channel.title: Ban help plz
channel.description:
ok guys this is just an example as im using this for somthin else, but how to i ban some one for saying somthing? like if they say "****" how would i make it detect that and detect who it is and ban them?
ok well i know how to ban them i mean how would i make it detect the one saying it without having to manually do it and declare playername or pid

item.title: Ban help plz
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

make a method to keep them off the server
make a boolean to check whos banned
wala done

Read full topic

item.title: Ban help plz
item.dc:creator: @soul_extange soul extange
item.description:
@soul_extange wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:3, topic:185633"][quote author=soul extange link=topic=247949.msg2083015#msg2083015 date=1204448550]
that would be very hard to do.
it’s kinda like a virus scan only your making it.
i would tell you if i could but i dont know the code.
im pretty sure its gona be in the client.java section right?
[/quote]

You have no clue.

Just have a quick check for any banned words when the server receives chat from the client before sending it out.[/quote]

sounds hard to me…

Read full topic
